Title: Savage Nights
Writer: Cyril Collard (novel), Cyril Collard, Jacques Fieschi (adaptation)
Actors: Cyril Collard, Romane Bohringer, Carlos López, Corine Blue
Plot: Jean is young, gay, and promiscuous. Only after he meets one or two women, including Laura does he come to realize his bisexuality. Jean has to overcome a personal crisis (he is HIV-positive) and a tough choice between Laura and his male lover Samy.
